Paragraphs

This is the default paragraph style. Note how lovely this text is. I handcrafted it just for you! Now let's see how it looks with emphasis. That's just so emphatic. This text can be pretty strong, too. You can even combine strength and emphasis (and vice versa).

Now what would a proper paragraph on the web be without a link to something else?
